ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Is Prophecy of Ro worth getting?
ygData.msgSnippet: PoR also comes with a free warhorse mount. There are some new zones, new equipment, and so on.  But the biggest thing I ve seen is just the warhorse mount.  As
ygData.messageBody:
PoR also comes with a free warhorse mount. 
 
There are some new zones, new equipment, and so on.  But the biggest thing I've seen is just the warhorse mount.  As with any of the expansions, you have to decide if its worththe money to you. 
 
I'm a sucker like that though.  I've played EQ for over 5 years now, and I've bought every expansion for 2 accounts.  The problem is, I don't see myself quitting any time soon.  I'm still addicted to the game, even after 5 years.  So as long as they keep coming out with expansions, I'll keep shelling out money to buy them.  It sounds stupid, but at least it ain't crack or meth or something that's going to shorten my life span.
 
W
----- Original Message -----
From: Just Me
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Saturday, April 15, 2006 12:00 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] Is Prophecy of Ro worth getting?

I have the other expansions, but is PoR worth getting just for the 8
extra bank slots?  So far, that's the only thing I've seen that would
be something I could use.  Am I missing something?
